nodes.text: Houliet was a female human who belonged to a small group of pirates during the Imperial Era. In her crew of three pirates, she was the smartest and most deceitful. Before becoming a pirate, Houliet served as a lieutenant in the military.
Houliet first appeared in the short story "The Witch & the Wookiee" in the novel Myths & Fables, written by George Mann with illustrations by Grant Griffin.
